Name: Denis Balic
Title: Senior Energy Engineer
Description: Denis Balic is a seasoned Mechanical Engineer specializing in alternative fuels and renewable energy, currently serving as a Senior Energy Engineer at Intermountain Health. With a robust background that includes roles as a Reliability Engineer at The AES Corporation and an O&M Engineer at sPower, Denis excels in heat transfer, thermodynamics, and fluid mechanics. His proficiency in tools like Matlab and Solidworks underscores his capability to drive innovative energy solutions and enhance operational efficiency.
Campaign_1_Subject_Line__c: Denis, congrats on Castle Solar Farm success!
Campaign_2_Subject_Line__c: Fellow energy efficiency advocate in healthcare
Campaign_3_Subject_Line__c: Impressed by Intermountain's clean energy strides
Campaign_4_Subject_Line__c: Utah Jazz season opener tonight—are you attending?
Energy_Project_History__c:
• Clean Fleet: Transitioned 19% of Intermountain Health's fleet to alternative fuels by the end of 2023, up from 1% in 2018.

• Clean Anesthetic Gas Usage: Reduced the organization's anesthetic gas greenhouse gas footprint by 70% through decreased Desflurane usage.

• Clean Energy Usage: Completed the Castle Solar Farm in 2024, providing 20 MWh of clean energy to Intermountain Health.

• Clean Commute and Patient Travel: Promoted hybrid working and telehealth to reduce staff and patient travel, contributing to a cleaner environment.

• Climate Risk Planning: Evaluated and planned for climate change impacts on facilities and operations, developing strategies to mitigate and adapt to these changes.
General_personal_information_notes__c: Specific details about Denis Balic's professional background, including his total years of experience and tenure at Intermountain Health, are not publicly available. However, his current role as Senior Energy Engineer indicates a strong background in energy management and sustainability within the healthcare sector.
Miscellaneous_notes__c: Intermountain Health's commitment to decarbonization and climate resilience, including the Castle Solar Farm, aligns with your role in energy engineering.
Rapport_summary__c: I saw you took on the role of Senior Energy Engineer at Intermountain Health - congrats, Denis!
Role_description__c: As Senior Energy Engineer at Intermountain Health, Denis Balic is responsible for leading energy management initiatives across the organization's facilities. His role involves developing and implementing strategies to optimize energy consumption, reduce costs, and enhance sustainability efforts. This includes overseeing energy audits, managing energy efficiency projects, and ensuring compliance with environmental regulations. Denis collaborates with various departments to integrate energy-saving practices into daily operations and supports the organization's commitment to environmental stewardship.
Summary_Why_should_they_care__c: I imagine in your role as Senior Energy Engineer at Intermountain Health, you've had to juggle old equipment issues while trying to cut energy use on a tight budget.
Why_their_role_is_relevant_to_Metrus__c: Denis Balic holds a senior position with significant decision-making authority over energy management and sustainability initiatives at Intermountain Health. His role involves substantial budget influence, particularly in areas related to energy efficiency and environmental compliance. Given the healthcare industry's emphasis on reducing operational costs and environmental impact, Denis is likely to face challenges such as managing energy consumption within budget constraints and addressing the rising costs of emergency repairs. Metrus' solutions can directly address these challenges by providing innovative financing options for energy efficiency projects, enabling cost savings and improved sustainability without upfront capital expenditures. Denis' strategic position and focus on energy management make him a valuable champion for Metrus' offerings within the organization.
Rapport_summary_2__c: I noticed we both share a passion for sustainable energy; I'm excited to chat about new ideas for energy efficiency in healthcare.
Rapport_summary_3__c: I saw that Intermountain Health just finished the Castle Solar Farm - impressive to see it supplying clean energy now!
Rapport_summary_4__c: With the Utah Jazz season kicking off, it's a fun time for basketball in Salt Lake City; maybe we can catch a game sometime soon!
